channel.title: General Ambientagent on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Ambientagent on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: My ambient agent project
item.description: I am officially starting my ambient agent project. Check out the website at ambientagent.com. I am on my way to the future. I added a wiki and filled out some of my thoughts. I think after filling out the entire wiki - i shall have enough info to create the little guy. I am excited.
